subject: Pause For A Moment And Just Pray
text:
When I am confused and discouraged and nothing 
Seems to go right, pause for a moment and  
Seek your advice. When I don't have the answers and I know not 
What to do, Pause for a moment and confide 
In you. You taught me not to wander or to stray, but 
To pause for a moment and just pray. We live in a world filled with anger, rage 
And despair; All it takes is to pause for 
A moment to pray, because you care. Thank you, dear Lord, knowing that you are 
Near, when I pause for a moment to pray, life 
Isn't so much to fear.
